projects.title: Movix
projects.description: A web application where users can view information and official video clips about movies and TV shows. They can sort the list according to rating, popularity, release date, and title.

projects.title: ClipHUB
projects.description: The ultimate destination for all your video clip needs! We are a dynamic project dedicated to curating a vast collection of video clips spanning various genres, styles, and themes.

projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: We are the best crypto trading app in India, we provide our guidance at a very reasonable price.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: A fully responsive web application which showcases my skills, projects, educations, and experience, aiming to impress potential employers and clients with my talent and dedication.

projects.title: Simon Game
projects.description: A memory-based game in which users must remember the order in which cards blinked and press them in the same order. At each level one more card will blink, and you must remember its previous order.
